summary: This document is an email chain from May 2024 forwarding an international submission from Jacqueline Pearce. The submission is a civilian crime report alleging a targeted sex crime involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell with connections to Australia and America. The email notes the report includes documents and a thumb drive, and that no response was sent as the sender is from Australia.

persons.name: Jacqueline Pearce
persons.context: Individual from Australia who submitted an international civilian crime report alleging a targeted sex crime involving Epstein and Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named in the submitted crime report as allegedly involved in a targeted sex crime.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named in the submitted crime report as allegedly involved in a targeted sex crime alongside Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Both are named together in the alleged crime report as being involved in a targeted sex crime.

events.title: Submission of International Crime Report
events.description: Jacqueline Pearce submits a civilian crime report alleging a targeted sex crime involving Epstein and Maxwell with connections to Australia and America. The submission includes documents and a thumb drive.

keyFacts: A civilian crime report was submitted internationally in May 2024 by Jacqueline Pearce from Australia.
The report alleges a 'targeted sex crime involving Epstein and Maxwell and multiple sources involved in Australia and America.'
The submission included documents and a thumb drive.
The receiving agency noted they do not respond to submissions from outside the country and considered forwarding it to an agent.
This indicates ongoing public submissions related to the Epstein case years after the main legal proceedings.
